fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each day, select a target, this cannot be changed during the night.

If more than one person visits your target, you will fire a cannon and kill at max two, but not the target. This will be Astral, and a powerful attack.

If one/zero people visit, you will kill your target only. This will be Physical, meaning all TP can kill you. This will be Basic.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You are the first priority in promotion lists.

You must reload your cannon after firing this will take one night, if you fail to fire it for any reason, you will not need to.

You can target a crew member once per game, but will not shoot them if the town fails to visit.
